forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. North northwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun retreats behind the hills of San Francisco, a softness envelops the city, draping it in a delicate layer of clouds. The chill settles gently into the air, with nighttime temperatures flirting with the cool embrace of 47 degrees. The streets, alive with the dappled glow of city lights, suggest an evening that is both tranquil and crisp, inviting one to wrap up warm in layers, perhaps a cozy cardigan over light cotton, and step outside to savor a quiet stroll.

As dawn unfolds its palette of promise, Saturday will greet us with a sunny disposition. The forecast hints at a high near 56, gradually dropping to a comfortable 54 as the day dances on. The north-northeast wind may playfully flit about, offering a gentle caress between 2 and 6 mph. Yet, even with this warmth, one would be wise to retain that cardigan, for the lingering coastal breeze may whisper of the ocean’s presence. The anticipated clarity of the day suggests that any fog will remain at bay, allowing for expansive views over the bay towards the Golden Gate Bridge. Embrace a day where adventure beckons—perhaps a leisurely walk along Crissy Field, where the air carries the salt of the sea, or a quiet moment with a cup of coffee at a local café, listening to the heartbeat of the city as it comes alive.
